description: Victims of genocide and ethnic cleansing in Myanmar - Rohingya and other persecuted ethnic groups

targets.name: Rohingya Genocide Victims
targets.description: Rohingya people who have been killed, disappeared, or severely affected by the genocide in Myanmar
targets.intention: May all Rohingya genocide victims find peace, may their families find justice and healing, may the persecution end

additional_data.estimated_count: Tens of thousands killed, hundreds of thousands displaced

targets.name: Rohingya Refugees in Bangladesh
targets.description: Rohingya refugees living in overcrowded camps in Bangladesh, especially children and elderly
targets.intention: May all Rohingya refugees find safety, dignity, and the right to return home in peace

targets.name: Missing Rohingya Persons
targets.description: Rohingya individuals who have disappeared during military operations and village raids
targets.intention: May all missing Rohingya persons be accounted for, may their families know their fate and find closure

targets.name: Karen Ethnic Persecution Victims
targets.description: Karen people who have been killed, displaced, or persecuted by Myanmar military forces
targets.intention: May all Karen persecution victims find safety and freedom, may their culture and people thrive

additional_data.estimated_count: Hundreds of thousands affected over decades

targets.name: Kachin Conflict Victims
targets.description: Kachin people affected by ongoing military conflict and persecution in northern Myanmar
targets.intention: May all Kachin conflict victims find peace, may the fighting end and their communities be restored

targets.name: Chin Persecution Victims
targets.description: Chin people who have been persecuted, killed, or displaced by Myanmar military and religious persecution
targets.intention: May all Chin persecution victims find safety and religious freedom, may their communities be protected

targets.name: Mon Conflict Victims
targets.description: Mon people who have been affected by military operations and persecution in Myanmar
targets.intention: May all Mon conflict victims find peace and cultural preservation, may their communities thrive

targets.name: Myanmar Political Prisoners
targets.description: Political prisoners detained, tortured, or killed by the military junta after the 2021 coup
targets.intention: May all political prisoners be freed, may democracy and human rights be restored in Myanmar

targets.name: Rohingya Women and Girls
targets.description: Rohingya women and girls who have been victims of sexual violence, rape, and gender-based persecution
targets.intention: May all Rohingya women and girls find healing and safety, may perpetrators be brought to justice
